_comment: Form.io TUS Bulk Mobile Upload Configuration Example
_description: Ready-to-use configuration for bulk photo uploads with mobile camera access
label: Upload Photos
_comment_multiple: Enables selecting 10-15+ files at once from any device
_comment_tusEndpoint: Replace with your TUS server endpoint URL
_comment_parallelUploads: Upload 3 files simultaneously (range: 1-10, use 2 for mobile networks)
_comment_filePattern: Accepts all image types; triggers camera option on mobile devices
_comment_capture: Hints for rear camera on mobile (use 'user' for front/selfie camera)
_note_capture: Desktop browsers ignore this gracefully - they show webcam option if available

validate._comment_required: Set to true if at least one file must be uploaded
validate._comment_maxFiles: Maximum number of files allowed (10-20 recommended for bulk uploads)

placeholder: Tap to select up to 15 photos from camera or photo library
_comment_placeholder: Instructional text shown before file selection
description: Select photos from your camera, photo library, or file browser. Uploads will auto-resume if connection is lost.
_comment_description: Help text displayed below the upload field
_comment_tableView: Hide file URLs in table view (show count instead)
_comment_input: Marks this as an input component (required for Form.io)
_comment_persistent: Save uploaded file data to submission
_comment_protected: Set true to encrypt file URLs in database

iOS_iPad.notes: Full camera access - do NOT disable for tablets

Laptop_MacBook.notes: 95%+ of laptops have webcams - enable camera access

Desktop_NO_Webcam.notes: Graceful degradation - no errors, camera option hidden

Surface_Pro.notes: Hybrid device - full camera support like iPad

WiFi_5G.notes: High-speed networks can handle larger chunks and more parallel uploads

4G_LTE.notes: Balanced configuration for typical mobile networks

4G_3G.notes: Smaller chunks for slower networks, fewer parallel uploads

_performance.recommendation: Use default 5MB chunks with 3 parallel uploads - works well across all networks

uploads_fail_mobile_network.cause: Chunk size too large for cellular speed

multi_select_not_working_ios.solution: Update iOS or verify multiple attribute is set

uploads_pause_never_resume.solution: Keep tab in foreground, increase server expirationPeriod to 7 days
